185976017.review:
When I was 13, this game was one of the most exciting things I'd ever played. It still holds up pretty well, especially with darthmod. 

Now they added grand campaign co-op, so it's time to revisit this classic. 
The co-op is kind of janky, but they're working on it, I'm sure it'll be fine in a few months.

185969934.review: This is the game I played so much back in the day, I had the physical special edition that came with a map and all that stuff. I could play Sweden and feel all patriotic and shit. Given how my chronic disease and being an angsty teenager had me down at the time this was the enjoyable time I could have back in the day. This game did have some, or even many, flaws yet it was so good. Just the age it is set in is so interesting just by itself. The introduction of the beautiful ships and naval battles was something quite amazing. It was just fantastic to play this game after school, or being home because I had an extra tough time with my disease. In a way, it saved me. I liked something at the time, and that helped me I think.

185967102.review: Bro, this game is fucking sick. I am a huge history buff and my favorite time period is the 18th century. This amazing total war game, that was ahead of it's time, contains three theaters of combat, a great trade system, and religious conflict. The battles are classic! This game allows you to take the helm of some of the Major World Powers of the 7 years war. 10/10 game.

185953649.review:
Recomendadísimo juego de estrategia militar ambientado en el siglo XVII con una cantidad de contenido que asusta y una jugabilidad extremadamente adictiva.

Y es que este juego es suficientemente profundo para no ser aburrido a la larga, pero suficiente mente complejo para mantenerte cautivado por horas y si te descuidas un momento, igual ya te lo estás introduciendo por la baticueva.  Otro punto a destacar es que la saga Total War se caracteriza por su accesibilidad a jugadores casuales o que no han tocado el género de estrategia en su vida, y en mi caso puedo confirmar que me parece una afirmación muy correcta en mi humilde opinión. Además el modo multijugador más tres campañas disponibles y varios paises por jugar, sumado a una atención al detalle y cuidado por ofrecer un producto sobresaliente, hacen que Total War: Empire se cuele en el top de los videojuegos más sólidos y completos que he tenido la oportunidad de jugar.

En definitiva, si hubiera tenido que gastarme el dinero en este juego conociendo todo lo anterior descrito, se me hacen insuficientes los 25 euros que cuesta el juego debido no solo a su calidad ni su cantidad de contenido sino a la accesibilidad del título y su atención a los jugadores inexperimentados.

185799782.review:
While Total War: EMPIRE did have some initial launch issues, I was finally able to fix it.
I think EMPIRE is a fantastic Total War game, and I recommend it. It features various nations and cinematic battles, however the battles and AI could use some work. In my opinion DarthMod is a must have.
So far, I haven't encountered any bugs, glitches, or faults (other than the starting error). The game is pretty old, though, and I'd love an EMPIRE 2.

⚠️ If you intend to buy this game, be aware of the problems you might get when attempting to launch it. ⚠️

9/10, I adore this game

185768405.review:
O jogo se passa no fim da Era Moderna (Mais especificamente 1700), onde você toma o comando de uma nação de sua escolha como Áustria, Prússia, Império Russo entre outros. Sendo o líder da nação você será responsável na questão militar, social e econômico, lutando em batalhas, lidando com rebeliões, estabilizar as cidades entre outros.
Eu amo esses tipos de jogos em que você pode "moldar" o passado e se tornar poderoso, além disso, gosto de micro gerenciar as coisas.
A melhor parte são as batalhas e cercos, indo desde uma batalha naval até um cerco em um forte. Nesse jogo não é só os números e a habilidade dos regimentos, mas o que pode definir define uma batalha é a SUA estratégia, o inimigo pode ter tantas tropas quiser, se você souber o que estiver fazendo e ter uma boa estratégia você pode ganhar uma batalha "perdida".

BUGS
O maior problema são os bugs, tem bastaste que não lembro. O jogo não chega a ser injogável, mas tem certos momentos que irrita e pode acabar com uma estratégia.

Mas no geral o jogo é incrível.

184966812.review: Pour moi, l'un des meilleurs total war, si ce n'est le meilleur. Après tant d'années, c'est toujours un immense plaisir de conquérir le Nouveau Monde à coup de mousquet, de défaire la Prusse aux portes de Vienne à grands renforts d'artillerie, d'industrialiser la Russie afin de submerger la sublime porte... La profondeur tactique sur le champ de bataille est folle car le peu de corps-à-corps rend les régiments plus mobiles et les manoeuvres bien plus nombreuses que dans les autres TW. Je dois ajouter une diplomatie aux petits oignons et toujours mouvementée : grâce aux nombreux mods, l'IA prend l'initiatives en maintes occasions. Bref, que du bonheur.

184280191.review:
I really don't know why everyone whines so much about this one, after the DAC mod for medieval 2, Empire is probably the best total war I've played, followed by Shogun 2 (which is maybe a bit smoother but nowhere near as grand). the Warhammer ones aren't engaging to me at all despite being a big Warhammer fan.
The man o war boat battles are epic in the late game.
How your empire can span the Americas, India and Europe is brilliant, more of this please.
I've not even installed Darth mod for this yet and I've had 400 hours out of it, played through as most major factions.
Playing as Britain you get loads of special unites from the Tv show Sharpe, 95th rifles etc, so if you liked that show you'll cream in your gusset over this.
Oh and they ported it to play on your phone for a tenner-ish on the android app store.

184113164.review:
Bu oyuna karşı olan hislerimi nasıl anlatsam bilemiyorum... Küçüklüğümden beri beni büyüleyen bir oyun. 
     Oyunun atmosferini çok severim. Bazı tarihsel hatalar olsa da 18. yüzyıl atmosferini çok güzel yansıtıyor. Haritası da diğer total war oyunlarına kıyasla çok büyük. Harita o dönemim Avrupa uluslarının ilgi odaklarını gösteriyor: Amerika , Hindistan , Afrika kıyıları, Doğu Hindistan. İsterseniz kolonial bir güç olup ticaret rotalarına hükmedebilir, isterseniz Maratha olup Avrupaya fillerle dalabilirsiniz. 
     Eksilerine gelirsek mal bir aı ya sahip oyun en zor da bile çok kolay. Diplomasi berbat. Savaşlar da bazen bug oluyor ve  1 saat savaşın bitmesini bekliyorsunuz. Sadece major ülkelerle oynayabiliyorsunuz minor devletlerle oynamak için mod yüklemeniz lazım. 
      Sonuç olarak, oyunun bazı sorunları modlarla hafifletilebir ve daha oynanılabilir hale getirilebilir. Diğer total war oyunlarından sonra çok kötü gelebilir savaş aı. Şahsen benim ilk total war oyunum olduğu için böyle bir şey yaşamadım. Eğer bu dönemi seviyorsanız bence yine de keyif alabileceğiniz bir oyun. Harita çok büyük ve ihtimaller çok fazla. Yapıcı şirket yönünü fantezi evrenine çevirdiği ve onlara dlc 'lerle artık paray para demediği için biz tarihsel total war sevicileri (asıl kitleyi) unuttu. Empire 2 'yi bekliyoruz.

184094832.review: One of the Total War series that really should have had a sequel. This game had so much potential for even more greatness.

184061541.review: Welteroberung im nicht zu komplizierten Style, Steuern, Forschung, Wachstum, Reiche gründen :D

183962890.review: Amazing Total War game. I played through Road to Independence and was not disappointed. Graphically, the game is the same as Total War Napoleon. Mechanically, it functions the same as most other Total War titles, except instead of units suffering from attrition and automatic replenishment, you instead have to manually click replenish on your individual units in your army. Honestly I would rate Empire the same as Napoleon in terms of quality and relative enjoyability. Solid 8/10, this is a highly recommended Total War title if you're wanting to play through them all.

183889139.review: Esse foi o primeiro Total War que eu joguei. É o jogo que me fez apaixonar pela série Total War e também pelo gênero de jogos de guerra/estratégia (de forma geral). Voltei a jogar o Empire depois de muito anos, usando o mod Empire II que deixa o jogo muito melhor que o vanilla. Top demais. Recomendo o jogo e principalmente o mod Empire II.

183886306.review:
Après ces 20 heures de jeu je vous recommande fortement le jeu:
J'ai découvert le jeu grace a des vidéo, après etre passer sur Steam j'ai découvert que le jeu datait un peu mais je l'ai comme meme essayer et j'ai eu raison!
Pour l'instant j'ai jouer que à la grande campagne (carte du monde) et c'est vraiment mon style de jeu, jeu de stratégie style "Hearts of Iron" mais le + c'est les combats avec de beau graphisme, pas mal d'unité, combat naval.
Par contre il manque un mode grande campagne (carte du monde) en multijoueurs (si vous voulez faire du multijoueurs c'est que des combats uniques).
Et le début est un peut difficile, c'est a dire qu'il faut 2/3 parties et apprendre des ses erreurs et les comprendre pour pouvoir faire une "vraie" partie.

183845700.review: The friendly AI pathfinding can be a little iffy, but the dynamic campaign and the strategic / positional battles make up for any flaws this game has.

183812537.review: В конце 2 главы в компании за США, я введу войска на гору, поставил пару полков почти наверху, 1 полк в дом, два других решил в обход. Сверху горы были французы, сначала они разбили полки на тропинке, потом вынесли полк в доме, побежали за отступающими с горы в лес солдатами. Стрелки попали в окружение, где французы их убили, индейцы держались до конца но их тоже сломили. Я в спешке отправил еще пару полков, но их тоже убили. И когда оставалось пару полков, и французы уже почти подошли, к счастью пришло подкрепление. Залпом растреляли пару вражеских полков, пошли в контратаку, храбрые индейцы пошли в ближний бой и они смогли обратить в бегство два французских полка. Потом мы поднялись вверх и уничтожили остатки французов и их артиллерию. И в итоге мы все таки смогли победить. Правь Британния! Боже, храни Короля!
